metadata.title: CVE-2023-24752 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: libde265 v1.0.10 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference in the ff_hevc_put_hevc_epel_pixels_8_sse function at sse-motion.cc. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted input file.

criterions.comment: libde265 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
